documents.document: @nerdarama @emmetbroaders @Bed_Forever_ I got accused of lifting my own tweet from Reddit last week. They are overprotective.
Oh shit I didn't realise Breitbart was hiring characters from Guess Who now. https://t.co/adCP5FL3hH
Penguin bars need to expand their repertoire of joke formats or risk being left behind. Let's see an *extremely [blank] voice* or something.
Hemorrhaging followers after disagreeing with the bag men, a known capital offence.
@Rubberbandits Got it. There's a class of art that you are happy to use for your own personal gain without any consideration for the artist.
@Rubberbandits "That's the way things are" does not make following that way the right thing to do. You can be better than that.
@Rubberbandits The difference being that your name was attached to that stuff. It's no help if a joke is seen by millions without credit.
@Rubberbandits Good for you. I've an essay about why it's fine for me to sell CD-Rs of Bags of Glue on the side of the road.
@Rubberbandits but only if they find out you've lifted their content
@Rubberbandits If you can't credit, don't share it. With an audience like yours you have a responsibility.
@Rubberbandits Got it. There's a class of art that you are happy to use for your own personal gain without any consideration for the artist.
@Rubberbandits You can always do it, but you choose not to. Nobody is forcing you to post lifted content uncredited on Facebook.
@Rubberbandits Got it. There's a class of art that you are happy to use for your own personal gain without any consideration for the artist.
Lifting by omission: apparently fine https://t.co/phRSM8xj3H
@Rubberbandits @emmetbroaders or you could only post things that you can credit because they don't just appear out of thin fucking air
@emmetbroaders I look forward to reading your new action-thriller novel
I see they had twitter as well https://t.co/dr9spZwGYz
Tagging someone in a comment to show them a post is like screaming their name repeatedly in the supermarket when you find the cereal aisle.
I think I'll watch Children of Men every week until I pinpoint exactly when it becomes better than reality https://t.co/Ksdd6TMV1T
As suspected this tweet has been deleted. Retweet far and wide https://t.co/1bp1n5e5IT
You'll never guess how much abuse I got from that numbers tweet during the week. I'll give you a hint: I'm a man.
Most likely action by Irish gov't in response to Trump's executive order
I have a theory that no joke has aged worse than every single reference to Who Wants to Be a Millionaire in the Simpsons

@hexplex Right, but it wasn't. Unless there's some other Reddit post I'm unaware of, which you could link me to.
@hexplex some lad nicked it to post on Reddit from here...
Number of times Theresa May referred to the US as Britain's "best bud": 6 Number of times Trump's motorcade left her behind at the mall: 2
@HughsNughs I'm leaning into the darkness in case of nuclear winter
The one hour thing is certainly a very specific trope of 24. But babies were few and far between. All and all, I'm not feeling this pitch.
Who am I in this scenario that a terrorist has targeted my baby specifically and I also have access to interrogate them? Am I Jack Bauer?

@johnorthside that's the sort of pessimism I can get behind
@johnorthside well nobody has explained the joke back to me or told me to kill myself, so I believe this is an above average experience
@emmetbroaders my mentions are making me dizzy
Well that sure blew up...

I will be disappointed in capitalism if Nestlé's marketing team haven't spent the week working on a Rolos sponsorship of the new Star Wars
@barryosull [distant sound of a fog horn in the docks] ah, that must be my shipment of spurious tangents
Nobody can define what "bread" is and I'm now scared I will be devoured by cannibals.
@faduda @oceanclub @MajorThrill @ownohmanny @johnorthside Then you are either being disingenuous or a fool I have no intention of educating
Please set out the guidelines on stealing bread to feed your family. How hungry are they? Is pizza bread? Yes or no answers only please.
@faduda @oceanclub @MajorThrill @ownohmanny @johnorthside You honestly don't see the difference between Richard Spencer and Katie Hopkins?
@faduda @oceanclub @MajorThrill @ownohmanny @johnorthside well if you think so but you seem to be having a lot of trouble comprehending it
@faduda @oceanclub @MajorThrill @ownohmanny @johnorthside the world is not black and white with a simple set of rules, imagine that
@barryosull In what hypothetical scenario would that many hypothetical scenarios be useful?
@faduda Oh no, it's against the rules. I just can't stop you because that's also against the rules. Violence is always wrong.
@faduda look, if you really want to punch her I'm not going to stop you

Me: We're all on board with the good thing? [Liberal pulls up in overloaded articulated lorry] L: Hold on, I've some hypothetical scenarios.
